{ "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (56,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(640, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), ] ), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (56,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(640, 56), font=0, color=0x0066ccff, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 0), size=(612, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), ] ), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (170,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(640, 79), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 80), size=(640, 90), color=0x009e9fa4, color_sel=0x009e9fa4, font=3, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=2), ], ), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (170,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(640, 170), font=0, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 0), size=(612, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 60), size=(612, 90), color=0x009e9fa4, color_sel=0x009e9fa4, font=3, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=3), ], ), }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 24), gFont("Regular", 19)], "itemHeight": 30 }
